content: materials - 8 16 skeins of purl soho s season alpaca 1 100% baby alpaca each skein is 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 1727 3454 yards required we used heirloom white - us 4 3 5 mm 32- 40- or 47-inch circular needles 2 gauge 32 stitches and 48 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size crib size throw size finished dimensions 32 42 inches wide x 40 55 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/season-alpaca html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881
